Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: VR Pinball Launcher

A Steam VR launcher for Visual Pinball tables with carousel interface.

Features:
- VR carousel interface for table browsing
- Keyboard controls (Shift/Arrow keys to browse, Enter/Space to launch)
- Automatic table detection from configured directory
- Wheel image support for table icons
- Seamless table launching with VPinballX
